function.name: drying_getProgress
function.description: This function is used to check the progress status of a dryer.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to check the progress.

groupAction.description: The group action to perform on the devices.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to check the progress.
